content: Hello Jeyachandran! Welcome to the interview today. I'm Master, the hiring officer. I reviewed your resume and I'm quite impressed with your extensive experience in AI project development, data engineering, and full-stack development. Can you tell me more about your experience with AI-powered chatbots, like the one you developed for an e-commerce website? What were some of the key features you focused on and how did you integrate real-time database integration?
